public interface LccIUiComposite
extends LccIUiComponent

Component that has other components inside it.

Method Detail

verifyAllEnabled

void verifyAllEnabled(boolean enable,
                      java.lang.Class... components)
Recursive call verifyEnabled for all components on this container

Parameters:
components - SubClasses of component will be verified. Ex. LccUiInputText, all LccUiInputText including subclasses will be verified.
enable - true enable, false disable

verifyAllEnable

void verifyAllEnable(boolean enable)
This is a helper method. It recursive verify if components exist and verify if its enable. On tables, start with index 0 and go on tring adding +1 on index until it doesn't exist.

Parameters:
enable - true enable, false disable

verifyAllPreviewslyActions

void verifyAllPreviewslyActions()
Recursive call verifyPreviewslyAction on components inside this container
